name: DIVE DEEP (or die trying)
description:
Oh no! You dropped something from your boat into the sea. You'll just have to gear up and dive to the bottom of the ocean to get it back!

  

HOW TO PLAY: Dive as deep as you can without running out of oxygen. You can get oxygen back by diving into the oxygen bubbles. Watch out, you lose more oxygen when you dive as well as when you hit a fish!

CONTROLS: Left and Right arrow keys to dive left and right. Use the mouse in menus.

  

This game was made for the Weekly Game Jam 132, with the theme "Deep Dive." It was made entirely by me, with the exception of some images I edited. I'll post the full credits below.

  

Credits : 

Made by Lucas Martinez with Unity 2019.3.0f, Gimp and Inkscape.

Sea background image : https://www.deviantart.com/dadrian/art/Underwater-Texture-2-392728461
